name: Aural Hunter
description: The Aural Hunter is a large, monstrous aberration with a chaotic, evil demeanor. It features high durability and striking physical attributes, equipped with claws and rib hooks as its primary weapons.
memorable: The Aural Hunter can consume sound, draining vitality from its foes while becoming even more resilient in battle.
goals: To dominate battles by using its ability to control sound and drain the life force of its opponents.
relations: Typically found in the company of other aberrations or chaotic evil creatures.
environment: Commonly found in caverns or areas of chaotic sound.
strengths: Exceptionally strong physically with the ability to grapple and silence opponents.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to thunder damage, which can disable its blindsight and other abilities.
attacks: Utilizes powerful claw and rib hook attacks, along with the formidable Consume Sound ability that inflicts necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Consume Sound, which allows it to siphon energy from grappled creatures, regain hit points, and render them deafened.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet but can only see 20 feet when deafened and has a passive Perception of 17 due to its exceptional Wisdom.
skills: Holds an impressive perception skill due to its high Wisdom, allowing it to detect sound effectively.
additional_information: Immune to blinding effects but cannot use blindsight while deafened or lacking sense of smell.
Grapples targets effectively with its Rib Hooks attack.
Can incapacitate foes through its sound-consuming abilities.
Possesses keen hearing with advantage on Perception checks reliant on hearing.
Weak against sound-related attacks that can deafen it.
test_queries: fearsome monster with unique sound abilities
